game.beginning: Our protagonist, a young warrior named Kai, wakes up in a mysterious world where time doesn't move. All around him are creatures of light and shadow, engaged in an unending static conflict.
game.ending: In his quest to restore balance, Kai manages to unchain time and return the world back to normal. Both light and shadow creatures can now live harmoniously. With the world's balance restored, Kai finds a portal to return home.
game.synopsis: In a world where time has come to a halt, young warrior Kai embarks on a journey to unravel the secret to stirring time. Along the way, he battles incredible adversaries, unravels intriguing puzzles, and discovers the true meaning of harmony. The game's main quest is to find the ancient artifacts required to unchain time and restore balance.
game.title: Unchained Time
